task.title: Hiding Deadlines
task.shortdesc: Deadlines may need to be hidden if they are cluttering your My Week page, or are currently not a top priority. Hiding them is simple, and can be quickly reversed if necessary. To hide a deadline:

step.cmd: Select the “Hide” text link to the right of the deadline
The Deadline will now be hidden and will not be visible on your “My Week” page
